statements: SELECT * FROM UserAccounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM UserAccounts WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM UserAccounts WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT user_id, email FROM UserAccounts WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM UserAccounts WHERE email = 'bob.smith@example.com';
SELECT * FROM UserAccounts WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT username, email FROM UserAccounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM UserAccounts WHERE password_hash = 'password123';
SELECT * FROM UserAccounts ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM UserAccounts WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM authentication;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(start_time) AS latest_session FROM user_sessions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.username, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM users u JOIN user_sessions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE s.start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE birthdate BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT user_id, full_name, bio FROM user_profiles WHERE bio IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, full_name FROM user_profiles WHERE birthdate > '1990-01-01';
SELECT sessions.session_id, users.username, permissions.role FROM sessions JOIN users ON sessions.user_id = users.user_id JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.user_id;
SELECT user_id, role FROM permissions WHERE grant_time < (SELECT MAX(grant_time) FROM permissions);
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE 'example%';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, email, created_at FROM Users WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT profile_id, first_name, last_name FROM UserProfiles WHERE gender='female';
SELECT session_id, user_id, logged_in_at FROM UserSessions WHERE last_active_at IS NOT NULL;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, s.theme_color FROM Users u JOIN UserSettings s ON u.user_id = s.user_id;
